name: GameMaker Leaderboard
description:
Add an online leaderboard within minutes. No sql knowledge required. Utilizes a file system for an easy setup. 

Posting a score as simple as 

     bnet_post_score("0", "tester", "leaderboard1", 100, false);

Requesting even simpler 

    bnet_get_leaderboard("leaderboard1");

**INCLUDED**

- simple java server

**LEAVE A RATE AND REVIEW** 

If wish for more networking features check out https://bahamagame.itch.io/gamemaker-networking.

Gmail: bahamagames@gmail.com 

Discord: rickky#1696
